item.description:
Last year we saw a pretty good movie at the Kendall on July 4th and then walked over to the MIT side of the river and listened to the Pops 10:00 pm show followed by the fireworks around 10:30.  It was a lovely evening.

I'm not sure exactly what's playing at the Kendall, but we'll pick something good (at the very least it will be Page One of the New York Times).

There won't be time to grab a bite, but there is food for sale along the river and we can walk and talk and watch the display.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be on the right side of the theater after the show. Before and during the show, I'll be in about the center of the 5th row.
item.name: Movies/Fireworks: Movie is The Trip - it starts at 6:45
